src: În ultimele trei decenii, deși a rămas oficial un stat comunist, China a dezvoltat o economie de piață. Primele reforme economice au fost făcute sub conducerea lui Deng Xiaoping. De atunci, economia Chinei a crescut în volum de 90 de ori. China a exportat pentru prima oară, anul trecut, mai multe mașini decât Germania și a întrecut Statele Unite, care reprezintă cea mai mare piață din această industrie. PIB-ul Chinei l-ar putea depăși pe cel al Statelor Unite în mai puțin de două decenii.
mt: In the last three decades, although remaining officially a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economy has grown in volume by 90 times. China exported more cars than Germany last year, surpassing the United States, which represents the largest market in this industry. China's GDP could surpass that of the United States in less than two decades.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: „Vom încerca să reducem emisiile de dioxid de carbon per unitate de PIB, până în 2020, cu o marjă semnificativă față de nivelul din 2005”, a declarat Hu. El nu a stabilit o cifră pentru reduceri, spunând că acestea se vor face în funcție de producția economică a Chinei. Hu a încurajat țările în curs de dezvoltare „să evite vechea metodă de a polua mai întâi, și să curețe mai târziu.” A adăugat că „n-ar trebui, totuși, să li se ceară să-și asume obligații care depășesc nivelul de dezvoltare, responsabilitate și capacitățile lor”.
mt: “ We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant margin by 2020 compared with 2005,” Hu said. He did not set a figure for reductions, saying they would be made according to China’s economic production. Hu encouraged developing countries “to avoid the old method of polluting first and cleaning up later.” He added that “they should not be asked to take on obligations that exceed their level of development, responsibility and capacity.”
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: Organizația caritabilă medicală Mangola, Medici fără Frontiere și Organizația Mondială a Sănătății spun că este cea mai gravă epidemie înregistrată în țară. „Richard Veerman, purtător de cuvânt al organizației Medici fără Frontiere, a declarat: «Angola se află în pragul izbucnirii celui mai grav focar de până acum, iar situația rămâne în continuare extrem de alarmantă în Angola».”
mt: The medical charity Mangola, Medecins Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organization say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. "Richard Veerman, a spokesman for the charity Medecins Sans Frontieres, said: 'Angola is on the brink of the worst outbreak yet, and the situation remains extremely alarming in Angola'."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Directorul Corpului public de Procurori, Kier Starmer QC, a făcut azi-dimineață o declarație în care a anunțat trimiterea în judecată atât a lui Huhne, cât și a lui Pryce. Huhne și-a dat demisia și Ed Davey urmează să-i ia locul în Cabinet. Se așteaptă ca Norman Lamb să preia postul de Ministru de Afaceri, eliberat de Davey. Huhne și Pryce urmează să apară în fața Westminster Magistrates Court pe 16 februarie.
mt: Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, made a statement this morning announcing the sending to trial both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and Ed Davey will take his place in the Cabinet. Norman Lamb is expected to take the post of Minister of State, vacated by Davey. Huhne and Pryce are expected to appear at Westminster Magistrates Court on 16 February.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: „Povestea, prezentată în opera franceză compusă de Camille Saint-Saens, este a unui artist «a cărui viață este dominată de iubirea pentru droguri și pentru Japonia».” Ca urmare, interpreții fumează țigări de canabis pe scenă, iar teatrul însuși încurajează publicul să se alăture.
mt: “The story, presented in the French opera composed by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ‘whose life is dominated by love for drugs and Japan.’” As a result, actors smoke marijuana on stage, and the theater encourages the audience to join in.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: „Leonov, cunoscut și ca «cosmonautul nr. 11», a făcut parte din echipa originală de cosmonauți a Uniunii Sovietice.” „Pe 18 martie 1965, el a întreprins prima activitate extravehiculară (AEV) umană, numită și «spacewalk», rămânând în afara vehiculului puțin peste douăsprezece minute.” „Pentru munca sa, a primit medalia de «Erou al Uniunii Sovietice», cea mai înaltă distincție a Uniunii Sovietice.” Zece ani mai târziu, a condus partea sovietică a misiunii Apollo-Soyuz, care a simbolizat sfârșitul Cursei Spațiale.
mt: “Leonov, known as the “Cosmonaut No. 11,” was part of the original Soviet cosmonaut team.” “On March 18, 1965, he performed the first human extravehicular activity (EVA), known as a “spacewalk,” remaining outside the vehicle for over twelve minutes.” “For his work, he was awarded the title of “Hero of the Soviet Union,” the highest distinction of the Soviet Union.” Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo-Soyuz mission, which symbolized the end of the Space Race.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: După ce a avut loc accidentul, Gibson a fost transportat la un spital, dar a decedat la scurt timp după aceea. Șoferul camionului, în vârstă de 64 de ani, nu a fost rănit în accident. Vehiculul în sine a fost îndepărtat de la locul accidentului în decursul aceleiași zile, în jurul orelor 12:00 GMT. „O persoană care lucrează într-un garaj din apropierea locului accidentului a declarat: «Erau copii care așteptau să treacă strada și toți țipau și plângeau.».” Toți au fugit înapoi de la locul accidentului.
mt: After the accident, Gibson was taken to a hospital, but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, aged 64, was not injured in the accident. The vehicle itself was removed from the accident scene during the same day, around 12:00 GMT. "A person who works in a nearby garage said: 'There were children waiting to cross the road and all were screaming and crying.' Everyone ran away from the accident scene."
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Munca depusă a fost în mare parte teoretică, dar programul a fost conceput pentru a stimula observarea galaxiei din Săgetător. Efectul pe care îl căuta echipa ar fi fost cauzat de forțele mareice produse între materia întunecată a galaxiei și materia întunecată a Căii Lactee. Așa cum Luna exercită o atracție asupra Pământului, provocând maree, tot astfel și Calea Lactee exercită o forță asupra galaxiei Săgetătorului. Oamenii de știință au reușit să concluzioneze că materia întunecată afectează alte materii întunecate în același fel cum o face materia obișnuită. Această teorie spune că materia întunecată dintr-o galaxie este localizată în jurul galaxiei ca un fel de aură și este compusă dintr-o mulțime de particule mici.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was designed to stimulate observation of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for was caused by tidal forces produced between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way. As the Moon exerts a pull on Earth, causing tides, so too does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. Scientists were able to conclude that dark matter affects other dark matters in the same way as ordinary matter. This theory says that dark matter in a galaxy is located around the galaxy as a kind of aura and is composed of a multitude of small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: „Dezbaterea a fost declanșată de controverse în legătură cu cheltuielile pentru ajutor și reconstrucție în urma uraganului Katrina; pe care unii conservatori le-au numit în glumă «New Deal din Orleans al lui Bush».” Criticile liberale ale efortului de reconstrucție s-au axat pe acordarea contractelor de reconstrucție celor din cercurile restrânse ale Washingtonului.
mt: “ The debate was sparked by controversy over spending for aid and reconstruction in the wake of Hurricane Katrina; which some conservatives have jokingly called “Bush’s New Deal in New Orleans.” Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to Washington insiders.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: „Dezbaterea a fost declanșată de controverse în legătură cu cheltuielile pentru ajutor și reconstrucție în urma uraganului Katrina; pe care unii conservatori le-au numit în glumă «New Deal din Orleans al lui Bush».” Criticile liberale ale efortului de reconstrucție s-au axat pe acordarea contractelor de reconstrucție celor din cercurile restrânse ale Washingtonului.
mt: “ The debate was sparked by controversy over spending for aid and reconstruction in the wake of Hurricane Katrina; which some conservatives have jokingly called “Bush’s New Deal in New Orleans.” Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to Washington insiders.

Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: Când capsula se apropie de Pământ și intră în atmosferă, în jurul orei 5:00 (ora estică), va părea ca un adevărat spectacol de lumini locuitorilor din California de Nord, Oregon, Nevada și Utah. Capsula va semăna mult cu o stea căzătoare care traversează cerul. Capsula va călători cu aproximativ 12,8 km sau 8 mile pe secundă, suficient de rapid pentru a ajunge de la San Francisco la Los Angeles într-un minut. Stardust va stabili un nou record al tuturor timpurilor ca fiind cea mai rapidă navă spațială care s-a reîntors pe Pământ, depășind recordul anterior stabilit în mai 1969 în timpul revenirii modulului de comandă Apollo X. „Se va deplasa deasupra coastei de vest a Californiei de Nord și va lumina cerul începând din California, trecând prin Oregon-ul central, apoi Nevada și Idaho, până în Utah”, a spus managerul de proiect al Stardust, Tom Duxbury.
mt: When the capsule approaches Earth and enters the atmosphere, around 5:00 a.m. (EST), it will appear like a real shooting star to residents of Northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will look a lot like a falling star that traverses the sky. The capsule will travel at about 12.8 kilometers or 8 miles per second, fast enough to get from San Francisco to Los Angeles in a minute. Stardust will set a new record for all time as the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, surpassing the previous record set in May 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. "It will move over the west coast of Northern California and light up the sky beginning in California, passing through central Oregon, then Nevada and Idaho, until Utah," said Stardust project manager Tom Duxbury.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Când capsula se apropie de Pământ și intră în atmosferă, în jurul orei 5:00 (ora estică), va părea ca un adevărat spectacol de lumini locuitorilor din California de Nord, Oregon, Nevada și Utah. Capsula va semăna mult cu o stea căzătoare care traversează cerul. Capsula va călători cu aproximativ 12,8 km sau 8 mile pe secundă, suficient de rapid pentru a ajunge de la San Francisco la Los Angeles într-un minut. Stardust va stabili un nou record al tuturor timpurilor ca fiind cea mai rapidă navă spațială care s-a reîntors pe Pământ, depășind recordul anterior stabilit în mai 1969 în timpul revenirii modulului de comandă Apollo X. „Se va deplasa deasupra coastei de vest a Californiei de Nord și va lumina cerul începând din California, trecând prin Oregon-ul central, apoi Nevada și Idaho, până în Utah”, a spus managerul de proiect al Stardust, Tom Duxbury.
mt: When the capsule approaches Earth and enters the atmosphere, around 5:00 a.m. (EST), it will appear like a real shooting star to residents of Northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will look a lot like a falling star that traverses the sky. The capsule will travel at about 12.8 kilometers or 8 miles per second, fast enough to get from San Francisco to Los Angeles in a minute. Stardust will set a new record for all time as the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, surpassing the previous record set in May 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. "It will move over the west coast of Northern California and light up the sky beginning in California, passing through central Oregon, then Nevada and Idaho, until Utah," said Stardust project manager Tom Duxbury.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: O doctoriță care a lucrat la Spitalul de Copii din Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania va fi acuzat de crimă cu premeditare după ce mama ei a fost găsită moartă în portbagajul mașinii sale miercuri, spun autoritățile din Ohio. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, în vârstă de 29 de ani, a fost găsită în Blue Ash, Ohio, o suburbie aflată la aproximativ 15 mile nord de Cincinnati, întinsă pe marginea drumului, îmbrăcată cu un tricou și lenjerie intimă, după ce se pare că ingerase mai multe medicamente. I-a dirijat pe agenți spre mașina ei neagră model Oldsmobile Intrigue, care se afla la 500 de piciore distanță. Acolo, au găsit cadavrul lui Saroja Balasubramanian, în vârstă de 53 de ani, acoperit cu pături pătate de sânge. Poliția a spus că corpul părea să se fi aflat acolo de circa o zi.
mt: 29-year-old Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, who worked at the Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, will be charged with murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Balasubramanian was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb about 15 miles north of Cincinnati, lying on the side of the road, wearing a t-shirt and underwear, after it appears she ingested several medications. She directed police to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue, which was about 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with bloody sheets. Police say the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Reprezintă cea mai mare achiziție din istoria eBay. Compania speră să-și diversifice sursele de profit și să câștige popularitate în zonele unde Skype deține o poziție puternică, precum China, Europa de Est și Brazilia.
mt: It is the largest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its sources of profit and gain popularity in areas where Skype has a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Aproximativ 40 dintre ceilalți deținuți care mai erau au rămas în curte și au refuzat să se întoarcă în celulele lor, când luptele au încetat, după ce răniții au fost transportați la spital. Negociatorii au încercat să rezolve problema, însă solicitările făcute de deținuți nu erau clare. Între orele 22:00-23:00 MDT, deținuții au pornit un incendiu în curte. Curând după aceea, trupe dotate cu echipament antirevoltă au intrat în curte și i-au încolțit pe deținuți folosind gaz lacrimogen. Echipajele de pompieri au reușit să stingă incendiul în jurul orei 23:35.
mt: 40 of the remaining inmates refused to return to their cells when the fighting stopped, after the injured were transported to the hospital. Negotiators tried to resolve the situation, but the demands made by the inmates were unclear. Between 10:00 and 11:00 MDT, inmates started a fire in the yard. Shortly after that, riot control troops entered the yard and gassed the inmates using tear gas. Fire crews were able to put out the fire around 11:35.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: "Comentariile ce au fost transmise în direct la televiziune, au reprezentat prima situație în care sursele iraniene de vârf au recunoscut că sancțiunile au un efect real. Acestea includ restricții financiare și interzicerea de către Uniunea Europeană a exportului de țiței, din care economia iraniană își trage 80% din veniturile sale externe. În cel mai recent raport lunar al său, OPEC a declarat că exporturile de țiței au atins cel mai mic nivel din ultimele două decenii, la 2,8 milioane de barili pe zi. „Liderul suprem al țării, ayatollahul Ali Khamenei, a descris dependența de petrol ca fiind «o capcană» anterioară revoluției islamice iraniene din 1979, din care țara ar trebui să se elibereze""."
mt: "Comments that were broadcast live on television represented the first time that Iranian top sources have acknowledged that sanctions have a real effect. These include financial restrictions and the European Union's ban on oil exports, from which the Iranian economy draws 80 percent of its foreign income. In its latest monthly report, OPEC declared that oil exports have reached their lowest level in the past two decades, at 2.8 million barrels per day. "The supreme leader of the country, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, described dependence on oil as a 'trap' prior to the Iranian Islamic Revolution in 1979, from which the country should be freed.""
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: În Franța, votarea a fost, în mod tradițional, o experiență puțin tehnică: alegătorii se izolează într-o cabină și introduc într-un plic o foaie de hârtie tipărită în prealabil pe care indică ce candidat au ales. După ce oficialii verifică identitatea alegătorului, acesta lasă plicul în urna de voturi și semnează lista de votare. Legea electorală franceză codifică mai degrabă strict procedurile de urmat. Din 1988, urnele de vot trebuie să fie transparente, astfel încât alegătorii și observatorii să confirme că nu există plicuri la începutul votului și că nu se adaugă plicuri, cu excepția celor ale alegătorilor numărați și autorizați în mod corespunzător. Candidații pot să-și trimită reprezentanți pentru a fi martori la toate etapele procesului. Seara, voturile sunt numărate de voluntari sub supraveghere strictă, cu respectarea unor proceduri clare.
mt: In France, voting has traditionally been a little technical experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth and introduce in a pre-printed envelope a piece of paper on which they indicate which candidate they have chosen. After officials check the identity of the voter, he leaves the envelope in the voting urn and signs the voting list. The French electoral law codifies rather strictly the procedures to be followed. Since 1988, the voting urns must be transparent, so that voters and observers can confirm that there are no envelopes at the beginning of the vote and that no envelopes are added, except those of the counted and authorized voters in a corresponding manner. Candidates can send representatives to be witnesses at all stages of the process. In the evening, the votes are counted by volunteers under strict supervision, with respect for clear procedures.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: Dacă este confirmată, descoperirea va încheia căutarea de opt ani întreprinsă de Allen pentru a găsi Musashi. După cartografierea fundului mării, epava a fost găsită folosindu-se o dronă subacvatică. Potrivit surselor, unul dintre cei mai bogați oameni, Allen, a investit o bună parte din averea sa în explorarea maritimă și și-a început misiunea de a găsi Musashi-ul dintr-un interes de-o viață față de război.
mt: If confirmed, the discovery will end Allen's eight-year search for Musashi. After mapping the ocean floor, the wreck was found using a submersible drone. According to sources, one of the richest men, Allen, has invested a good part of his fortune in maritime exploration and has begun his mission to find Musashi from a lifelong interest in war.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Reportajele televizate arată un fum alb care iese din uzină. Autoritățile locale avertizează locuitorii din vecinătatea fabricii să rămână în interior, să oprească aparatele de aer condiționat și să nu bea apă de la robinet. Conform agenției nucleare a Japoniei, în incinta uzinei au fost identificate radioizotopi de cesiu și iod. Autoritățile speculează că aceasta indică faptul că este posibil ca recipientele în care este ținut combustibilul de uraniu să se fi crăpat și să prezinte scurgeri.
mt: Television reports show a white smoke coming from the factory. Local authorities warn residents near the factory to stay inside, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water. According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine isotopes were found in the factory. Authorities speculate that this indicates that it is possible that the containers holding the uranium fuel may have cracked and leaked.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll a descoperit prezența tuberculozei extrem de rezistente la medicație (XDR-TB) în regiunea sud-africană KwaZulu-Natal. „Într-un interviu, el a declarat că noua variantă este «foarte tulburătoare și îngrijorătoare din cauza ratei foarte mari a mortalității».” Este posibil ca unii pacienți să fi contractat virusul în spital, susține doctorul Moll, iar cel puțin 2 erau cadre medicale ale spitalului. Pe durata unui an de zile, o persoană infectată poate infecta între 10 și 15 persoane cu care se află în contact apropiat. Cu toate acestea, procentul de XDR-TB în întregul grup de persoane cu tuberculoză pare să fie încă scăzut; 6.000 din totalul de 330.000 de persoane infectate la un moment dat în Africa de Sud.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the presence of extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal. "In an interview, he said the new variant was'very disturbing and alarming because of the very high mortality rate.'" It is possible that some patients contracted the virus in the hospital, Dr. Moll maintains, and at least two were hospital staff. Over the course of a year, an infected person can infect between 10 and 15 people with whom they are in close contact. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of tuberculosis patients appears to be still low; 6,000 out of a total of 330,000 people infected at some point in South Africa.
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: NextGen este un sistem despre care FAA afirmă că ar permite aeronavelor să parcurgă distanțe mai scurte, economisind astfel milioane de galoane de carburant în fiecare an și diminuând emisiile de carbon. Utilizează tehnologie care se bazează pe folosirea sateliților, spre deosebire de sistemele mai vechi bazate pe radare la sol, pentru a permite controlorilor de trafic aerian să localizeze cu mai multă precizie aeronavele și să transmită piloților informații mai precise.
mt: NextGen is a system that FAA claims will allow aircraft to fly shorter distances, saving millions of gallons of fuel each year and reducing carbon emissions. It uses technology based on satellites, instead of older ground-based radar systems, to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft more precisely and to transmit more precise information to pilots.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Istoricii au criticat politicile FBI din trecut pentru concentrarea resurselor pe cazuri ușor de rezolvat, în special pe cazuri de mașini furate, cu intenția de a spori rata de succes a agenției. Congresul a început să finanțeze inițiativa contra obscenității în anul fiscal 2005 și a specificat că FBI-ul trebuie să dedice 10 agenți pornografiei adulte.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past policies for concentrating resources on easy cases, especially stolen cars, with the intent of increasing the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in the fiscal year 2005 and specified that the FBI must dedicate 10 agents to pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Aparatul JAS 39C Gripen s-a prăbușit pe o pistă în jurul orei locale 9:20 a.m. (0230 UTC) și a explodat, ducând la închiderea aeroportului pentru zboruri comerciale. Pilotul a fost identificat ca fiind liderul escadrilei Dilokrit Pattavee. Presa locală raportează că un vehicul de pompieri din aeroport s-a răsturnat în timp ce se ducea spre o urgență.
mt: The JAS 39C Gripen aircraft crashed on a runway around local time 9:20 a.m. (0230 UTC) and exploded, leading to the closure of the airport for commercial flights. The pilot was identified as squadron leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media report that a fire engine from the airport overturned while going to an emergency.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: Pe tot parcursul anilor 1960, Brzezinski a lucrat pentru John F. Kennedy în calitate de consilier al acestuia, iar apoi pentru administrația Lyndon B. Johnson. În timpul alegerilor din 1976, acesta l-a consiliat pe Carter cu privire la politica externă, apoi a fost consilier de securitate națională (NSA), din 1977 până în 1981, succedându-i lui Henry Kissinger. În calitate de NSA, el l-a asistat pe Carter în gestionarea diplomatică a unor probleme globale, cum ar fi Acordurile de la Camp David, 1978; normalizarea relațiilor SUA-China de la sfârșitul anilor 1970; Revoluția iraniană, care a dus la criza ostaticilor din Iran, 1979; și invazia sovietică din Afganistan, 1979.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as a Kennedy's advisor, and then for the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson. During the 1976 elections, he advised Carter on foreign policy, and then was national security advisor (NSA), from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he advised Carter in the diplomatic management of global problems, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalization of US-China relations at the end of the 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Născut în capitala Croației, Zagreb, Bodek a dobândit faimă în perioada în care a jucat pentru Partizan Belgrad. Li s-a alăturat în 1945 și a rămas până în 1958. În timpul petrecut la echipă, a marcat 403 de goluri în 468 de ieșiri pe teren. Nimeni n-a jucat în mai multe partide și nu a înscris mai multe goluri pentru club decât Bobek. În 1995, a fost votat cel mai bun jucător din istoria echipei Partizan.
mt: Born in the capital of Croatia, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame during the period in which he played for Partizan Belgrade. He joined in 1945 and remained until 1958. During his time at the club, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances on the field. No one has played in more games and scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995, he was voted the best player in the history of the Partizan team.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: Hesperonychus elizabethae este o specie ce face parte din familia Dromaeosauridae și este un văr al velociraptorului. Se credea că această pasăre de pradă cu sânge cald, complet acoperită cu pene, mergea în poziție verticală, pe două picioare cu gheare precum velociraptorul. „A doua sa gheară era mai lungă, reprezentând astfel originea numelui Hesperonychus, care înseamnă «gheara de vest».”
mt: Hesperonychus elizabethae  is a species belonging to the family Dromaeosauridae and is a relative of the velociraptor. It was believed that this warm-blooded, feathered predator walked in a vertical position, on two clawed feet like the velociraptor. "Its second claw was longer, representing the origin of the name Hesperonychus, which means 'claw of the west'."
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Cel puțin 100 de persoane participaseră la petrecere, pentru a sărbători prima aniversare a unui cuplu se se căsătorise anul trecut. Un eveniment aniversar oficial a fost programat pentru o dată ulterioară, au anunțat autoritățile. Cuplul se căsătorise în Texas cu un an în urmă și veniseră în Buffalo pentru a sărbători împreună cu prietenii și rudele. Soțul de 30 de ani, născut în Buffalo, a fost unul dintre cei patru omorât în timpul împușcăturilor, dar soția lui nu a fost rănită.
mt: 100 or more people had attended a party to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple who had married last year. An official anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, authorities said. The couple had married in Texas a year ago and had come to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, born in Buffalo, was one of four killed in the shootings, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Luno avea la bord 120-160 de metri cubi de combustibil, când a suferit defecțiunea și vânturile puternice și valurile l-au împins înspre dig. Cei doisprezece membri ai echipajului au fost salvați cu elicopterele și singura accidentare a fost un nas spart. Vasul de 100 de metri era în curs de a ridica încărcătura obișnuită de fertilizator și, inițial, oficialii s-au temut că vasul ar putea să verse o încărcătură.
mt: 12 crew members were rescued by helicopters and the only injury was a broken nose. The ship was in the process of loading its usual cargo of fertilizer and officials initially feared the ship could spill its load.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Realizările lui Vautier, în afara celor obținute ca regizor, includ o grevă a foamei în 1973, pentru a protesta împotriva a ceea ce considera a fi cenzură politică. Legea franceză a fost modificată. Și-a început activitatea de activist pe când avea 15 ani și s-a alăturat Rezistenței franceze în timpul celui de-al Doilea Război Mondial. A scris despre el însuși într-o carte, în 1998. În anii 1960 s-a întors în Algeria, un nou stat independent, pentru a preda regia de film.
mt: In addition to his work as a director, Vautier's achievements include a hunger strike in 1973 to protest what he considered political censorship. The French law was changed. He began his activist career at age 15 and joined the French Resistance during World War II. He wrote about himself in a book in 1998. In the 1960s he returned to Algeria, a new independent state, to teach film directing.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Peste patru milioane de persoane s-au deplasat la Roma pentru a lua parte la funeralii. Numărul de persoane prezente a fost atât de mare, încât nu a fost posibil ca toată lumea să poată avea acces la înmormântarea din Piața Sf. Petru. Mai multe ecrane TV de mari dimensiuni au fost instalate în diferite locuri din Roma pentru a permite populației să urmărească ceremonia. În multe alte orașe din Italia și din restul lumii, în special în Polonia, au fost realizate instalații similare, care au fost urmărite de un număr mare de persoane.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome. The number of people present was so great that it was not possible for everyone to have access to the burial in St. Peter's Square. Larger TV screens were installed in different places in Rome to allow the population to follow the ceremony. In many other cities in Italy and the rest of the world, especially in Poland, similar installations were made, which were followed by a large number of people.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Conform rapoartelor, un apartament de pe Strada Macbeth a explodat din cauza unei scurgeri de gaze. Un reprezentant al furnizorului de gaze a venit la fața locului după ce un vecin a semnalat o scurgere de gaze. După sosirea reprezentantului oficial, apartamentul a explodat. Nu au fost raportate leziuni grave, dar cel puțin cinci persoane aflate la fața locului în momentul exploziei au fost tratate pentru simptome de șoc. Nu se afla nimeni în apartament. La acel moment, aproape 100 de locuitori erau evacuați din zonă.
mt: According to reports, a flat on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. A gas supplier representative came to the scene after a neighbor reported a gas leak. After the official's arrival, the flat exploded. No serious injuries were reported, but at least five people at the scene at the time of the explosion were treated for shock symptoms. No one was in the flat. At that time, almost 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Cei decedați sunt Nicholas Alden, de 25 de ani, și Zachary Cuddeback, de 21 de ani. Cuddeback a fost șofer. Edgar Veguilla a fost rănit la braț și la maxilar, iar Kristoffer Schneider va avea nevoie de chirurgie facială reconstructivă. Arma lui Uka s-a defectat în timp ce era îndreptată spre capul unui al cincilea bărbat. Schneider are dureri continue, nu vede cu un ochi, îi lipsește o secțiune a craniului și are fața reconstruită din titan. Mărturia lui Schneider a fost preluată prin intermediul unui link video, dintr-o bază USAF situată în țara sa natală.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cuddeback were killed. Cuddeback was the driver. Edgar Veguilla was injured in the arm and jaw, and Kristoffer Schneider will need facial reconstructive surgery. Uka's gun jammed when it was aimed at the head of a fifth man. Schneider's testimony was taken via a video link from a USAF base in his native country.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Atât golful, cât și rugbiul urmează să se întoarcă la jocurile olimpice. Comitetul Olimpic Internațional a votat includerea sporturilor în cadrul întâlnirii comitetului său executiv, astăzi, la Berlin. Rugby-ul, în special uniunea rugby-ului, și golful au fost selectate în fața altor 5 sporturi pentru a fi luate în considerare ca discipline la Jocurile Olimpice. S-a încercat includerea în programul olimpic a unor sporturi precum squash, karate și patinajul pe role, alături de baseball și softball, sporturi care au fost excluse de la Jocurile Olimpice din 2005. Votul mai trebuie ratificat de COI la întâlnirea din octombrie de la Copenhaga.
mt: Both the bay and rugby are set to return to the Olympic games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive committee meeting today in Berlin. Rugby, in particular the rugby union, and the bay were selected ahead of five other sports to be considered as disciplines at the Olympic Games. An attempt was made to include sports such as squash, karate and roller skating, along with baseball and softball, sports which were excluded from the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must be ratified by the IOC at the meeting in October in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: Pe 24 septembrie 1759, Arthur Guiness a semnat concesionarea pe o perioadă de 9000 de ani a St James' Gate Brewery din Dublin, Irlanda. 250 de ani mai târziu, Guinness a devenit un brand global, cu o cifră de afaceri anuală de 10 miliarde de euro (14,7 miliarde de dolari SUA).
mt: 24 September 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9000 year lease on St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness became a global brand, with an annual revenue of 10 billion euros (14.7 billion US dollars).
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: A fost confirmat faptul că H5N1, o tulpină de gripă aviară letală pentru oameni, infectase o rață sălbatică găsită moartă luni pe un teren mlăștinos din apropierea orașului Lyon din estul Franței. Franța este a șaptea țară din Uniunea Europeană afectată de acest virus; după Austria, Germania, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Grecia și Italia. Cazurile suspecte de H5N1 în Croația și Danemarca sunt în continuare neconfirmate.
mt: It was confirmed that H5N1, a deadly avian flu strain for humans, infected a wild duck found dead Monday on a marshy area near the eastern French city of Lyon. France is the seventh European Union country affected by the virus; after Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected H5N1 cases in Croatia and Denmark are still unconfirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: Forțele ONU de menținere a păcii, sosite în Haiti după cutremurul din 2010, sunt învinovățite de răspândirea bolii, al cărei focar a izbucnit în apropierea taberei trupelor. Conform procesului, deșeurile taberei ONU nu au fost igienizate corespunzător, provocând contaminarea bacteriană a afluentului fluviului Artibonite, unul dintre cele mai mari din Haiti. Înainte de sosirea trupelor, Haiti nu mai avusese din anii 1800 probleme legate de boală. Institutul Haitian pentru Dreptate și Democrație a citat studii independente care sugerează că batalionul ONU nepalez de menținere a păcii ar fi introdus neintenționat boala în Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, expertă ONU în ceea ce privește această boală, a declarat că cea mai probabilă sursă a focarului este reprezentată de forțele de menținere a păcii.
mt: United Nations peacekeeping forces, arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are blamed for spreading the disease, whose outbreak occurred near the camp. According to the process, the UN camp waste was not properly sanitized, causing bacterial contamination of the Artibonite river, one of the largest in Haiti. Before the arrival of the troops, Haiti had not had problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy cited independent studies that suggest that the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unintentionally introduced the disease into Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, UN expert on this disease, said the most likely source of the outbreak is the peacekeeping forces.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: Guvernul irlandez subliniază urgența unei legiferări parlamentare pentru a rectifica situația. „În acest moment, este important atât din punct de vedere al sănătății publice, cât și al justiției penale ca legislația să fie adoptată cât mai curând posibil”, a declarat un purtător de cuvânt al guvernului. Ministrul Sănătății a exprimat îngrijorări atât cu privire la sănătatea persoanelor care profită de legalitatea temporară a substanțelor implicate, cât și în privința sentințelor de condamnare legate de droguri, emise de la intrarea în vigoare a modificărilor care acum sunt neconstituționale.
mt: The Irish government underlines the urgency of a parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. "At this moment, it is important both from a public health and criminal justice perspective that legislation is passed as soon as possible," a government spokesman said. The Health Minister expressed concerns both about the health of people who benefit from the temporary legality of the substances involved, as well as about the sentencing of drug-related convictions, issued at the entry into force of the changes that are now unconstitutional.
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: Christopher Garcia, un purtător de cuvânt al Departamentului de poliție din Los Angeles, a declarat că suspectul, de gen masculin, se află sub cercetare pentru încălcarea proprietății mai degrabă decât pentru vandalism. „Semnul nu a suferit deteriorări fizice; alterarea a fost făcută cu ajutorul unor prelate negre, decorate cu semne ale păcii și o inimă, pentru a transforma majuscula «O» într-un «e» mic.”
mt: Christopher Garcia, a spokesman for the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspect, a male, is being investigated for property damage rather than vandalism. "The sign did not suffer physical damage; the alteration was made with black tape, decorated with peace signs and a heart, to transform the majuscule 'O' into a small 'e'."
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: Karno a fost un profesor de engleză binecunoscut, însă controversat, care a predat la Modern Education și King's Glory și care susținea că a avut 9 000 de elevi la apogeul carierei sale. În notițele de curs a folosit cuvinte pe care unii părinți le-au considerat grobiene și se spune că la clasă ar fi folosit înjurături. Modern Education l-a acuzat că a imprimat, fără autorizație, reclame de mari dimensiuni, pe autobuze și a mințit spunând că el este profesorul principal al catedrei de engleză. A fost, de asemenea, acuzat anterior de încălcarea drepturilor de autor, însă nu a fost găsit vinovat. Un fost elev a afirmat că „folosea cuvinte din argou în timpul orei, preda abilități pentru întâlniri amoroase în notițe și era ca un «prieten» al elevilor”.
mt: Karno was a well-known, but controversial, English teacher who taught at Modern Education and King's Glory and who claimed to have had 9,000 students at the height of his career. In his lesson notes he used words that some parents considered vulgar and it is said that in class he used profanity. Modern Education accused him of printing, without permission, large advertisements on buses and lying saying that he is the head of the English department. He was also previously accused of copyright infringement, but was not found guilty. A former student said that "he used slang during class, taught skills for romantic meetings in notes and was like a 'friend' of the students".
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Un fost polițist filipinez a ținut ostatici turiști din Hong Kong, deturnându-le autobuzul în Manila, capitala statului Filipine. Rolando Mendoza a tras în turiști cu pușca sa M16. Mai mulți ostateci au fost salvați și până acum a fost confirmat decesul a cel puțin șase. Șase ostatici, inclusiv copiii și bătrânii, au fost eliberați mai devreme, alături de fotografii filipinezi. Mai târziu, fotografii au luat locul unei femei în vârstă care avea nevoie de toaletă. Mendoza a fost împușcat.
mt: A former Philippine police officer held Hong Kong tourists hostage, hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza shot at tourists with his M16. Several hostages were rescued and so far the death of at least six has been confirmed. Six hostages, including children and the elderly, were released earlier, along with Filipino photographers. Later, photographers took the place of an elderly woman who needed to use the bathroom. Mendoza was shot.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Brazilia este cea mai mare țară Romano-Catolică de pe Pământ, iar Biserica Romano-Catolică s-a opus, în mod sistematic, legalizării căsătoriei între persoanele de același sex în țară. Congresul Național al Braziliei a discutat legalizarea timp de 10 ani, iar astfel de căsătorii civile sunt în prezent legale doar în Rio Grande do Sul. Proiectul de lege original a fost elaborat de fostul primar al orașului São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. Legislația propusă este acum în mâinile lui Roberto Jefferson, după ce a fost modificată. Protestatarii speră să colecteze 1,2 milioane de semnături pentru petiție, urmând a o prezenta la Congresul Național din noiembrie.
mt: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has systematically opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The Brazilian National Congress has discussed legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently legal only in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson, after being modified. Protesters hope to collect 1.2 million signatures for a petition, to be presented to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: La cinci minute de la începerea prezentării, vântul își face simțită prezența; aproximativ un minut mai târziu, vântul ajunge la 70 km/h... apoi vine ploaia, dar atât de tare și cu picături atât de mari încât îți lovește pielea ca un ac, apoi a căzut grindina, iar oamenii au intrat în panică, țipând și călcându-se în picioare. „«Am pierdut-o pe sora mea și pe prietena ei, iar pe drum erau două persoane invalide în scaune cu rotile, oamenii pur și simplu săreau peste ele și le împingeau», a spus Armand Versace.”
mt: 5 minutes into the presentation, the wind starts to make itself felt; about a minute later, the wind reaches 70 km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and with such big drops that it hits your skin like a needle, then the hail comes, and people went into panic, screaming and tripping over each other. "I lost my sister and her friend, and on the way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people were just jumping over them and pushing them," said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Furtuna, situată la aproximativ 645 de mile (1040 km) la vest de insulele Capului Verde, este posibil să se împrăștie înainte să amenințe vreo zonă terestră, spun meteorologii. Fred are în prezent vânturi cu viteze de 105 mile pe oră (165 km/h) și se deplasează spre nord-vest. Fred este cel mai puternic ciclon tropical înregistrat atât de departe spre sud și est în Atlantic de când au apărut imaginile prin satelit și doar al treilea uragan major înregistrat la est de 35°V.
mt: The storm, located about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde Islands, is expected to dissipate before threatening any land area, say meteorologists. Fred has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving north-west. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since satellite imagery began and only the third major hurricane ever recorded east of 35°V.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: Standardul 802.11n operează atât pe frecvența de 2,4 Ghz, cât și pe cea de 5,1 Ghz. Aceasta îi va permite compatibilitatea retroactivă cu 802.11a, 802.11b și 802.11g cu condiția ca stația de bază să dispună de transmisie radio dublă. Vitezele de 802.11n sunt în mod considerabil mai mari decât acelea ale predecesorilor săi, cu un transfer maxim teoretic de 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n operates on both the 2.4 GHz and 5.1 GHz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided the base station has dual radio transmission. 802.11n's speeds are considerably higher than its predecessors, with a theoretical maximum transfer rate of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Medaliatul cu aur la Olimpiadă urma să înoate la Jocurile Commonwealth-ului, în probele de 100 m și 200 m liber, precum și în trei probe de ștafetă, însă condiția sa fizică a fost pusă sub semnul întrebării din cauza plângerilor sale. Nu a putut să ia medicamentele necesare pentru a controla durerea, acestea fiind interzise în timpul Jocurilor.
mt: 2012 Olympic gold medalist was to swim in the Commonwealth Games in the 100 and 200 meter freestyle, as well as three relay events, but his physical condition was put in question due to his complaints. He could not take the necessary medication to control the pain, which were banned during the Games.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: Harta internațională a cutremurelor a Serviciului de Prospectare Geologică al Statelor Unite nu a indicat cutremure în Islanda pentru săptămâna precedentă. Biroul meteorologic al Islandei de asemeni nu a anunțat nicio activitate seismică în zona Hekla pe parcursul ultimelor 48 de ore. Activitatea semnificativă a cutremurului care a dus la schimbarea fazei a avut loc pe 10 martie, pe partea de nord-est a caldeirei de pe vârful vulcanului. Nori întunecați, fără legătură cu vreo activitate vulcanică, au fost raportați la baza muntelui. Norii au creat premisa unei confuzii asupra producerii sau nu a unei erupții reale.
mt: The US Geological Survey's International Seismological Summary map did not indicate earthquakes in Iceland for the previous week. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also did not report any seismic activity in the Hekla area in the last 48 hours. Significant earthquake activity occurred on March 10, on the northeast side of the caldera on the volcano's peak. Dark clouds, unrelated to any volcanic activity, were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds created the premise of a confusion about the production or not of a real eruption.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Orbitatorul lunar fără pilot Chandrayaan-1 a lansat sonda Moon Impact Probe (MIP), care s-a apropiat de suprafața Lunii cu o viteză de 1,5 kilometri pe secundă (3000 de mile pe oră) și a reușit să aterizeze forțat în apropierea polului sud al Lunii. Alături de trei instrumente științifice importante, sonda lunară a purtat și imaginea drapelului național al Indiei, zugrăvit pe toate laturile ei.
mt: The lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 launched the Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which approached the lunar surface at a speed of 1.5 kilometers per second (3000 miles per hour) and successfully crash-landed near the lunar south pole. Along with three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the national flag of India, painted on all its sides.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

Alături de trei instrumente științifice importante, sonda lunară a purtat și imaginea drapelului național al Indiei, zugrăvit pe toate laturile ei.

src: Primele cazuri de boală din acest sezon au fost raportate la sfârșitul lunii iulie. Boala este purtată de porci, aceasta trecând apoi la oameni prin intermediul țânțarilor. Focarul a determinat guvernul indian să ia măsuri precum trimiterea de prinzători de porci în zonele grav afectate, distribuirea a mii de perdele de țânțari și pulverizarea cu pesticide. Câteva milioane de fiole cu vaccinul contra encefalitei au fost, de asemenea, promise de către guvern, care vor ajuta agențiile de sănătate să se pregătească pentru anul următor. Planurile de a livra vaccinurile în zonele istoric cele mai afectate au fost întârziate anul acesta datorită fondurilor insuficiente și a priorității reduse acordate în comparație cu alte boli.
mt: The first cases of the disease this season were reported at the end of July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then pass it to humans through mosquitoes. The outbreak prompted the Indian government to take measures such as sending pig catchers to heavily affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito nets and spraying pesticides. Several million doses of the encephalitis vaccine were also promised by the government, which will help health agencies prepare for next year. Plans to deliver the vaccines to historically affected areas were delayed this year due to insufficient funds and a lower priority compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Amendamentul propus fusese deja adoptat de ambele camere în 2011. O modificare a fost introdusă în cursul acestei sesiuni legislative când a doua propoziție a fost întâi eliminată de Camera Reprezentanților, apoi adoptată într-o formă similară luni de către Senat. Refuzarea celei de-a doua propoziții, care propune interzicerea uniunilor civile între persoane de același sex, ar putea deschide ușa uniunilor civile în viitor. Urmând procedura, pentru a putea rămâne pe rol, HJR-3 va fi revizuit din nou în 2015 sau 2016, de către legislatura următoare.
mt: 2011, the proposed amendment was already passed by both chambers. A change was introduced during this legislative session when the second proposition was first removed by the House of Representatives, then adopted in a similar form on Monday by the Senate. Rejecting the second proposition, which proposes a ban on same-sex civil unions, could open the door to civil unions in the future. Following procedure, HJR-3 will be reviewed again in 2015 or 2016 by the next legislature.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: „Panama Papers” este un termen general folosit pentru aproximativ zece milioane de documente aparținând firmei de avocatură Mossack Fonseca din Panama, care au ajuns în mâna presei în primăvara anului 2016. Documentele au arătat că paisprezece bănci au ajutat clienți bogați să ascundă averi de miliarde de dolari americani pentru a evita plata impozitelor și alte reglementări. Ziarul britanic The Guardian a sugerat că Deutsche Bank controla în jur de o treime din cele 1200 de companii fictive folosite pentru a realiza acest lucru. Au fost organizate proteste în toată lumea, mai multe urmăriri penale, iar liderii guvernelor din Islanda și Pakistan au demisionat.
mt: “Panama Papers” is a general term used for approximately ten million documents belonging to the law firm Mossack Fonseca in Panama, which came into the hands of the press in the spring of 2016. The documents showed that fourteen banks helped wealthy clients to hide billions of dollars in order to avoid paying taxes and other regulations. The British newspaper The Guardian suggested that Deutsche Bank controlled about a third of the 1200 fictitious companies used to do this. Protests were organized all over the world, more criminal investigations, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Accidentele aeriene sunt frecvente în Iran, care are o flotă îmbătrânită și slab întreținută, atât pentru operații civile, cât și militare. Sancțiunile internaționale au însemnat că nu puteau fi cumpărate avioane noi. La începutul acestei săptămâni, prăbușirea unui elicopter de poliție a dus la moartea a trei persoane și rănirea altora trei. Luna trecută, Iran a trăit cel mai mare dezastru aerian din ultimii ani, când un avion de linie cu destinația Armenia s-a prăbușit, cei 168 de oameni la bord fiind uciși. În cursul aceleiași luni, un alt avion a ieșit de pistă în Mashhad, lovind un zid, ceea ce a dus la decesul a șaptesprezece persoane.
mt: Accidents are frequent in Iran, which has an aging and poorly maintained fleet, both for civil and military operations. International sanctions meant that new aircraft could not be purchased. At the beginning of this week, the crash of a police helicopter led to the death of three people and injury of three others. Last month, Iran experienced the worst air disaster in recent years, when a passenger jet bound for Armenia crashed, killing all 168 people on board. During the same month, another plane veered off the runway in Mashhad, hitting a wall, which led to the death of seventeen people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Grupul de studiu Irak și-a prezentat raportul astăzi la 12:00 GMT. Avertizează că Nimeni nu poate garanta în acest moment că vreo intervenție în Irak va opri războiul sectar, violența în creștere sau o alunecare spre haos. Raportul se deschide cu o pledoarie pentru o dezbatere deschisă și formarea unui consens în Statele Unite cu privire la politica față de Orientul Mijlociu. Raportul este extrem de critic cu privire la aproape fiecare aspect al politicii actuale a executivului față de Irak și solicită o schimbare imediată de direcție. Prima recomandare dintre cele 78 pe care le-a făcut a fost demararea unei noi acțiuni diplomatice înainte de sfârșitul acestui an în scopul de a asigura frontierele Irakului împotriva intervențiilor ostile și pentru a restabili relațiile diplomatice cu vecinii săi.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report today at 12:00 GMT. It warns that no one can guarantee that any intervention in Iraq will stop sectarian war, rising violence or a slide into chaos. The report opens with a plea for an open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about Middle East policy. The report is extremely critical about almost every aspect of the current administration's policy towards Iraq and calls for an immediate change of direction. The first of the 78 recommendations it made was to start a new diplomatic initiative before the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders against hostile interventions and to restore diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
