src: Vă rugăm să rețineți că, în principiu, vizitați locul unei gropi comune, precum și un sit care are o semnificație aproape incalculabilă pentru o parte semnificativă a populației lumii. Sunt încă în viață mulți bărbați și multe femei care au supraviețuit internării acolo, și mult mai mulți care au avut membri ai familiei care au fost uciși sau siliți să lucreze până la moarte acolo, atât evrei cât și alții. Sunteți rugați să tratați locul cu toată demnitatea, solemnitatea și respectul pe care îl merită. Nu faceți glume pe tema Holocaustului sau a naziștilor. Nu vandalizați locul desenând și făcând zgârieturi pe structurile existente.
mt: Please note that you are visiting the site of a mass grave, as well as a place that has an almost incalculable significance to a significant portion of the world's population. Many men and many women are still alive who survived internment there, and many more who had family members who were killed or forced to work to death there, both Jews and others. You are asked to treat the site with all the dignity, solemnity, and respect that it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or the Nazis. Do not vandalize the site by drawing and scratching on existing structures.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Limbile auxiliare sunt limbi artificiale sau construite, create cu intenția de a înlesni comunicarea între popoare care, în caz contrar, ar întâmpina dificultăți de comunicare. Sunt separate de lingua francas, care sunt limbi naturale sau organice, care devin dominante dintr-un motiv sau altul ca mijloc de comunicare între vorbitorii altor limbi.
mt: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages, created with the intention of facilitating communication between peoples who, otherwise, would encounter difficulties in communication. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages, which become dominant for some reason or another as a means of communication between speakers of other languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Dacă traversați Marea Baltică de Nord pe timp de iarnă, luați aminte la amplasarea cabinei, dat fiind că navigarea printre ghețuri produce un zgomot insuportabil pentru cei mai sensibili. Croazierele din Sankt Petersburg includ și timp petrecut în oraș. Pasagerii croazierei sunt scutiți de obligația de a-și obține viză (vedeți condițiile).
mt: If you're crossing the Baltic Sea in winter, be aware of the cabin placement, as navigation through ice produces an unbearable noise for the most sensitive. Cruises in St. Petersburg also include time spent in the city. Cruise passengers are exempt from the obligation to obtain a visa (see conditions).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Limbile oficiale ale Barcelonei sunt Catalana și Spaniola. Aproape jumătate preferă să vorbească Catalană, o mare majoritate o înțelege, și practic toți știu Spaniolă. Totuși, majoritatea panourilor sunt realizate doar în catalană, deoarece aceasta este stabilită de lege ca fiind prima limbă oficială. Spaniola este însă larg utilizată în transportul în comun, alături de alte servicii. Anunțurile periodice la metrou sunt făcute doar în catalană, însă întreruperile neașteptate sunt anunțate de un sistem automat în diferite limbi inclusiv spaniolă, engleză, franceză, arabă și japoneză.
mt: The official languages of Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. Almost half prefer to speak Catalan, a large majority understand it, and practically everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are only in Catalan, as this is established by law as the first official language. Spanish is however widely used in public transport, along with other services. Metro announcements are made only in Catalan, but unexpected interruptions are announced by an automated system in different languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic, and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Azi, în țările dezvoltate, oferta cu demipensiune de lux a devenit un fel de formă de artă. La urma urmelor, este evident că pensiunile se întrec la două lucruri în principal: cazarea și micul dejun. Prin urmare, în cele mai rafinate dintre aceste unități, clienții au parte de așternuturi somptuoase, care pot include cuverturi lucrate manual sau paturi vechi. Micul dejun poate include bunătăți regionale de sezon sau specialitatea gazdei. Scena ar putea fi o clădire istorică veche, cu mobilier vechi, terenuri îngrijite și o piscină.
mt: Today, in developed countries, the luxury half-board offer has become a kind of art. After all, it is obvious that pensions compete mainly in two things: accommodation and breakfast. Therefore, in the most refined of these units, guests have the luxury of sumptuous bedding, which can include hand-made covers or old beds. Breakfast can include seasonal regional delicacies or the host's specialty. The scene could be an old historic building, with old furniture, well-kept grounds and a pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Orașul Beijing din China va fi gazda Jocurilor Olimpice de iarnă din 2022, ceea ce îl va face primul oraș care va fi găzduit atât Jocurile Olimpice de vară, cât și pe cele de iarnă. Beijing va găzdui ceremoniile de deschidere și de închidere, precum și evenimentele pe gheață în spații acoperite. Alte evenimente de schi vor avea loc în stațiunea de schi din Taizicheng în Zhangjiakou, la circa 220 km (140 mile) de Beijing.
mt: Beijing, China will host the 2022 Winter Olympics, making it the first city to host both the Summer and Winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies, as well as ice events in covered spaces. Other skiing events will take place in the ski resort of Taizicheng in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Gripa aviară, numită și gripa păsărilor, poate infecta atât păsările, cât și mamiferele. Au fost observate mai puțin de o mie de cazuri la oameni, dar unele dintre ele s-au dovedit fatale. Cele mai multe au implicat persoane care lucrează cu păsări de curte, dar există un nivel de risc și pentru observatorii de păsări.
mt: Avian influenza, also known as bird flu, can infect both birds and mammals. There have been less than a thousand cases in humans, but some have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with backyard poultry, but there is also a risk for birdwatchers.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

Cele mai multe au implicat persoane care lucrează cu păsări de curte, dar există un nivel de risc și pentru observatorii de păsări.

src: Vikingii au folosit apele navigabile rusești pentru a ajunge din Marea Neagră în Marea Caspică. Părți ale acestor rute mai pot fi încă folosite. Verificați să nu aveți nevoie de permise speciale, care pot fi dificil de obținut. Canalul Marea Albă - Marea Baltică pune în legătură Oceanul Arctic cu Marea Baltică prin Lacul Onega, Lacul Ladoga și Sankt Petersburg, în cea mai mare parte prin râuri și lacuri. Lacul Onega este conectat și cu Volga, deci este încă posibil să se ajungă în Rusia prin Marea Caspică.
mt: The Vikings used the Russian navigable waters to reach the Caspian Sea from the Black Sea. Parts of these routes may still be used. Check to see if you need special permits, which can be difficult to obtain. The White Sea - Baltic Sea connects the Arctic Ocean with the Baltic Sea through Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and St. Petersburg, mostly through rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is connected with Volga, so it is still possible to reach Russia through the Caspian Sea.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Punct de control a imigrației reprezintă de obicei primul loc unde vă opriți după debarcarea din avion, vapor sau alt vehicul. În unele trenuri transfrontaliere, sunt făcute inspecții în trenul în mers și trebuie să ai cu tine un document de identitate valid când te îmbarci într-unul dintre ele. În trenurile cu cușetă, pașapoartele pot fi colectate de către conductor, astfel încât să nu trebuiască să vă întrerupeți somnul.
mt: A border control checkpoint is usually the first place you stop after disembarking from a plane, ship or other vehicle. In some cross-border trains, inspections are made on the train in motion and you must have a valid ID document when boarding one of them. In sleeper trains, passports can be collected by the conductor, so you don't have to interrupt your sleep.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: Singapore este în general un loc extrem de sigur, în care vă puteți orienta cu ușurință și puteți cumpăra aproape orice imediat ce ajungeți acolo. „Dar aflându-se în «tropicele superioare», la doar câteva grade nord de ecuator, veți avea de înfruntat atât căldura (întotdeauna), cât și soarele puternic (atunci când e senin, mai rar).”
mt: Singapore is generally a very safe place, where you can easily get around and buy almost anything as soon as you arrive. "But being in the 'upper tropics', just a few degrees north of the equator, you will have to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when it's clear, less often)."
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Produsele de patiserie germane sunt destul de bune, iar în Bavaria sunt destul de bogate și variate, asemănătoare celor ale vecinei sudice, Austria. Produsele de patiserie cu fructe sunt obișnuite, merele fiind folosite de-a lungul întregului an, iar cireșele și prunele făcându-și apariția vara. Multe produse de panificație nemțești conțin și migdale, alune de pădure și alte nuci. Deseori, prăjiturile populare merg foarte bine cu o ceașcă de cafea tare. Dacă vrei niște produse de patiserie mici, dar bogate, gustă ceea ce, în funcție de regiune, sunt denumite Berliner, Pfannkuchen sau Krapfen.
mt: German pastries are pretty good, and in Bavaria they are pretty rich and varied, similar to those of the southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, apples being used throughout the year, and cherries and plums appearing in the summer. Many German pastries contain almonds, hazelnuts and other nuts. Often, popular cakes go well with a strong cup of coffee. If you want some small but rich pastries, try what, depending on the region, are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Dacă vrei să vezi lumea la preț mic, din necesitate, stil de viață sau ca o provocare, există câteva moduri de a face asta. Pe scurt, acestea se împart în două categorii: ori lucrezi în timp ce călătorești, ori încerci să îți limitezi cheltuielile. Acest articol se concentrează pe cea din urmă. Pentru acele persoane care sunt dispuse să sacrifice din confortul personal, din timp și din probabilitatea de a diminua cheltuielile până aproape de 0, pot consulta bugetul minim pentru călătorie. Sfaturile pleacă de la premisa că voiajorii nu fură, nu încalcă legea, nu iau parte la piața neagră, nu cerșesc și nu exploatează alte persoane în scopuri proprii.
mt: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or as a challenge, there are a few ways to do it. Briefly, these break down into two categories: either you work while you travel, or you try to limit your expenses. This article focuses on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice personal comfort, time and the probability of reducing expenses down to near zero, consult the minimum budget for travel. The tips start from the premise that travelers don't steal, don't break the law, don't participate in the black market, don't beg and don't exploit others for personal gain.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: Porțiunea dintre Point Marion și Fairmont prezintă cele mai dificile condiții de trafic de pe întreaga întindere a autostrăzii Buffalo-Pittsburgh, traversând adesea prin zone izolate și neamenajate. Dacă ești obișnuit să conduci pe drumuri de țară, nu-ți pierde controlul: pantele abrupte, benzile înguste și curbele periculoase predomină. Limitele de viteză sunt semnificativ inferioare celor din secțiunile precedente – în general 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) – și este cu atât mai important să fie respectate cu strictețe. Cu toate acestea, destul de bizar, serviciul de telefonie mobilă este mult mai puternic aici decât de-a lungul multor alte porțiuni ale traseului, de ex. Pennsylvania Wilds.
mt: The portion between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most difficult traffic conditions along the entire Buffalo-Pittsburgh route, often traversing through isolated and unimproved areas. If you are used to driving on country roads, don't lose control: abrupt slopes, narrow lanes and dangerous curves predominate. Speed limits are significantly lower than in the preceding sections – generally 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) – and it is all the more important to be strictly observed. However, quite bizarrely, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other portions of the route, e.g. Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: Canyoning (sau canyoneering) înseamnă explorarea fundului unui canion, care este fie uscat, fie plin cu apă. Canyoning combină elemente de înot, cățărare și sărituri, dar pentru început nu necesită un antrenament intens sau o formă fizică de invidiat (comparativ cu alpinismul, scufundările sau schi alpin, de exemplu).
mt: C anyoning (or canyoneering) is the exploration of the bottom of a canyon, which may be either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements of swimming, climbing and jumping, but does not require intense training or a physique to be envied (in comparison to mountaineering, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: A-ți lua propria mașină și a face o călătorie lungă are un farmec intrinsec în simplitatea sa. Spre deosebire de vehiculele mai mari, probabil sunteți deja obișnuit să conduceți propria mașină și îi cunoașteți limitele. Ridicarea unui cort pe un teren privat sau într-o așezare de orice mărime poate atrage atenție nedorită. „Pe scurt, mașina este un vehicul ideal pentru a pleca într-o călătorie, dar rar o modalitate de a «campa».” Este posibilă camparea cu mașina dacă aveți o dubiță mare, SUV, sedan sau break cu scaune care se rabatează pe spate.
mt: Taking your own car and making a long trip has an intrinsic charm in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already used to driving your own car and know its limits. Raising a tent on private land or in any settlement can attract unwanted attention. "In short, the car is an ideal vehicle for leaving on a trip, but rarely a way to «camp»." It is possible to camp with a car if you have a large double, SUV, sedan or break with seats that fold down.
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Orașul modern Casablanca a fost fondat de pescari berberi în secolul al X-lea î.e.n. și a fost folosit ca port strategic de fenicieni, romani și marinizi, fiind numit Anfa. A fost distrus de portughezi, care l-au reconstruit numindu-l Casa Branca, dar l-au abandonat din nou în 1755, în urma unui cutremur. Sultanul marocan a reconstruit orașul sub numele de Daru l-Badya, iar numele de Casablanca i-a fost dat de către negustorii spanioli care stabiliseră acolo baze comerciale. Casablanca este unul dintre cele mai puțin interesante locuri din Maroc în care să mergeți la cumpărături. În jurul Medinei vechi este ușor de găsit locuri care vând bunuri tradiționale marocane, cum ar fi tajine, ceramică, obiecte de pielărie, narghilele și o mulțime de tot felul de mărunțișuri, dar e totul pentru turiști.
mt: Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BC and was used as a strategic port by Phoenicians, Romans and Moors, being named Anfa. It was destroyed by Portuguese, who rebuilt it naming it Casa Branca, but abandoned it again in 1755, after an earthquake. Sultan of Morocco rebuilt the city under the name of Daru l-Badya, and the name of Casablanca was given by Spanish merchants who established commercial bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places in Morocco to go shopping. Around the old medina it is easy to find places that sell traditional Moroccan goods, such as tajines, ceramics, leather goods, hookahs and a lot of small stuff, but it's all for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: La nord, ușor accesibil, se află romanticul și fascinantul oraș Sintra, care a devenit în afara granițelor țării în urma unei treceri revistă entuziaste a splendorilor sale, făcută de Lordul Byron. Autobuzul Scottburb 403 face curse regulate spre Sintra, cu oprire la Cabo da Roca. Tot în partea de nord puteți vizita și Sanctuarul Sfintei Fecioare din Fatima, un loc cunoscut în toată lumea pentru aparițiile Sf. Maria.
mt: To the north, easily accessible, is the romantic and fascinating city of Sintra, which became known outside the country after a thorough review of its splendors, made by Lord Byron. The Scottburb 403 bus makes regular trips to Sintra, with a stop at Cabo da Roca. Also in the north, you can visit the Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima, a place known throughout the world for the apparitions of St. Mary.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: În 1994, regiunea etnic armeană Nagorno-Karabah din Azerbaidjan a declarat război azerilor. Cu sprijin din partea Armeniei, o nouă republică a fost creată. Cu toate acestea, nicio națiune existentă – nici măcar Armenia – nu o recunoaște oficial. Disputele diplomatice asupra regiunii continuă să tulbure relațiile dintre Armenia și Azerbaidjan.
mt: 1994, the ethnic Armenian region of Nagorno-Karabakh in Azerbaijan declared war on Azerbaijanis. With support from Armenia, a new republic was created. However, no existing nation – not even Armenia – officially recognizes it. Diplomatic disputes over the region continue to complicate relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Unul dintre punctele puternice ale orașului Charlotte, Carolina de Nord, este că abundă în opțiuni de înaltă calitate pentru familii. Locuitorii din alte zone adesea pomenesc atmosfera propice familiilor ca motiv principal pentru care s-au mutat acolo, iar vizitatorii adesea spun că se pot bucura de oraș alături de copii. În ultimii 20 de ani, numărul de opțiuni adecvate pentru copii în Uptown Charlotte a crescut exponențial. În general, taxiurile nu sunt folosite de familiile din Charlotte, deși pot fi de ceva folos în anumite împrejurări. Există o suprataxă pentru mai mult de 2 pasageri, astfel încât această opțiune s-ar putea dovedi mai a fi mai scumpă decât e necesar.
mt: One of the strongest points of the city of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it abounds in high-quality options for families. Residents of other areas often mention the family-friendly atmosphere as the main reason they moved there, and visitors often say they can enjoy the city with their children. In the last 20 years, the number of options suitable for children in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. In general, taxis are not used by families in Charlotte, although they can be useful in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for more than two passengers, so this option may turn out to be more expensive than necessary.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: Înainte de sosirea spaniolilor în secolul al XVI-lea, nordul statului Chile se afla sub Imperiul Inca, pe când araucanii indigeni (mapuche) locuiau în zonele centrală și de sud ale statului Chile. Mapuche a fost și unul dintre ultimele grupuri independente de indigeni americani, astfel încât n-au fost pe de-a întregul asimilați de majoritatea vorbitoare de spaniolă decât după ce Chile și-a câștigat independența. Cu toate că Chile și-a declarat independența în 1810 (în timpul războiului napoleonian care a lăsat Spania fără un guvern central funcțional pentru o perioadă de câțiva ani), o victorie decisivă împotriva Spaniei nu a fost obținută până în 1818.
mt: Before the arrival of the Spaniards in the 16th century, the northern part of the state of Chile was under the Inca Empire, while the Araucanians (mapuche) indigenous people lived in the central and southern parts of the state of Chile. Mapuche was also one of the last independent groups of indigenous Americans, so they were not fully assimilated by the majority of Spanish speakers until after Chile had won its independence. Although Chile declared its independence in 1810 (during the Napoleonic Wars which left Spain without a functioning central government for a period of several years), a decisive victory over Spain was not achieved until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre, care înseamnă Cinci Ținuturi, cuprinde cele cinci sate mici de coastă, Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza și Monterosso, aflate în regiunea italiană Liguria. Acestea figurează pe Lista Patrimoniului Mondial UNESCO. De-a lungul secolelor, oamenii au construit cu atenție terase pe terenul accidentat și abrupt, ducând în sus la stâncile cu vedere spre mare. O parte din farmecul său îl reprezintă absența unei dezvoltări corporatiste vizibile. Satele comunică unele cu altele prin poteci, trenuri și bărci, iar cu mașina nu se poate pătrunde din afara zonei.
mt: 5 Terre, which means Five Lands, includes the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso, in the Italian region of Liguria. These are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged terrain, leading up to the cliffs with views of the sea. Part of its charm is the absence of visible corporate development. The villages communicate with each other by paths, trains and boats, and cars cannot penetrate from outside the area.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: Pe timp de iarnă, cele mai frecvente cauze ale accidentelor sunt drumurile alunecoase, trotuarele (pavajul) și, mai ales, scările. Ca minimă pregătire, ai nevoie de încălțăminte cu tălpi potrivite. Încălțămintea de vară, de obicei, alunecă foarte tare pe gheață și pe zăpadă, chiar și unele cizme de iarnă sunt deficitare. Modelul trebuie să fie suficient de adânc, 5 mm (1/5 inci) sau mai mult, iar materialul să fie suficient de moale la temperaturi scăzute. Unele ghete au crampoane și există echipament suplimentar folosit pentru condițiile alunecoase, adecvat pentru majoritatea pantofilor și ghetelor, sau pentru tocuri și tălpi. Tocurile ar trebui să fie joase și late. Nisip, pietriș sau sare (clorură de calciu) sunt deseori împrăștiate pe drumuri sau poteci pentru a crește tracțiunea.
mt: In winter, the most common causes of accidents are icy roads, sidewalks (pavement), and especially stairs. As a minimum preparation, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer footwear, usually, slides very badly on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The model should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material should be sufficiently soft at low temperatures. Some shoes have cleats and there is additional equipment used for icy conditions, suitable for most footwear and boots, or for heels and soles. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) are often spread on roads or paths to increase traction.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: Insulele Cook sunt o țară insulară, asociată ca stat liber cu Noua Zeelandă, situată în Polinezia, în mijlocul Pacificului de Sud. Este un arhipelag format din 15 insule, care se întind pe mai mult de 2,2 km² de ocean. „Fiind pe același fus orar cu Hawaii, insulele sunt câteodată numite «Hawaii de jos».” Cu toate că e mai mică, le reamintește vizitatorilor de Hawaii înainte să fi devenit stat, fără hotelurile mari pentru turiști și alte dezvoltări. Insulele Cook nu au niciun oraș, ci sunt compuse din 15 insule diferite. Cele mai importante sunt Rarotonga și Aitutaki.
mt: The Cook Islands are a self-governing island country in the South Pacific, associated with New Zealand in free association. The Cook Islands' 15 islands have a combined land area of 240 square kilometres (92.6 sq mi). The Cook Islands' Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ), however, has an area of 1,030,000 square kilometres (400,000 sq mi). "Being on the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes called "Hawaii's southern group". Although smaller than Hawaii, they remind visitors of Hawaii before it became a major tourist destination, without the large hotels and other tourist developments. The Cook Islands are not a city, but are composed of 15 different islands. The most important are Rarotonga and Aitutaki.
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Pentru permise trebuie să faceți rezervare în prealabil. Aveți nevoie de un permis pentru a rămâne peste noapte la Sirena. Sirena este singura stațiune de rangeri care, pe lângă camping, oferă și camere și o masă caldă. La Leona, San Pedrillo și Los Patos oferă doar amenajări de camping, fără servicii alimentare. Permisele de acces în parc pot fi obținute direct de la postul de pază din Puerto Jiménez, dar nu este acceptată plata cu cardul Serviciul Parcului (MINAE) nu eliberează permise pentru vizitarea parcului cu mai mult de o lună înainte de data sosirii. CafeNet El Sol oferă un serviciu de rezervare contra unei taxe de 30 dolari americani, sau 10$ pentru permise de o zi; detalii pe pagina lor Corcovado.
mt: You need a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that, in addition to camping, offers rooms and a hot meal. At Leona, San Pedrillo and Los Patos they only offer camping facilities, without food service. Access permits to the park can be obtained directly from the guard post in Puerto Jiménez, but card payments are not accepted. The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue permits for visiting the park more than a month before the arrival date. CafeNet El Sol offers a booking service for a fee of $30, or $10 for day permits; details on their page Corcovado.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Drumeție cu rucsacul în spate pe schiuri: Această activitate mai este numită și schi în zone nemarcate, schi de tură sau drumeție pe schiuri. Este o activitate înrudită, dar care de obicei nu presupune turnee de schi alpin sau alpinism, acestea din urmă fiind desfășurate pe terenuri mult mai abrupte și necesitând schiuri și bocanci mult mai rigizi. Gândiți-vă la traseul de schi ca la un traseu similar de drumeții. În condiții bune, veți reuși să acoperiți distanțe ceva mai lungi decât mergând pe jos – dar foarte rar veți putea atinge viteze tipice pentru schi fond fără un rucsac greu în spate, pe piste îngrijite.
mt: Hiking with a backpack on skis: This activity is also known as backcountry skiing, ski touring or ski hiking. It is a related, but usually not involving alpine skiing or alpinism, which are done on much steeper terrain and require stiffer skis and boots. Think of the ski trail as a similar hiking trail. In good conditions, you will be able to cover longer distances than walking on foot – but rarely will you be able to achieve typical cross-country ski speeds without a heavy backpack on groomed trails.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Șocul reîntoarcerii acasă se manifestă mai rapid decât șocul cultural (persistă mai puțin din euforia lunii de miere), are o durată mai lungă și poate fi mai sever. Călătorii care s-au adaptat cu ușurință culturii noi, întâmpină uneori greutăți deosebite în readaptarea la cultura lor nativă. Dacă ați reveni acasă după ce ați locuit în străinătate, v-ați fi adaptat deja la noua cultură și v-ați fi pierdut din obiceiurile din cultura natală. Când abia plecaserăți în străinătate, oamenii erau probabil răbdători și înțelegători, fiind conștienți că vizitarea unei țări noi presupune un proces de adaptare. Lumea nu se așteaptă întotdeauna ca răbdarea și înțelegerea să fie necesare și față de călătorii care se întorc acasă.
mt: The shock of returning home manifests itself more quickly than the cultural shock (it persists less of the honeymoon euphoria), has a longer duration and can be more severe. Travelers who have adapted easily to the new culture, sometimes encounter severe difficulties in readapting to their native culture. If you return home after living abroad, you have already adapted to the new culture and have lost your customs from your native culture. When you just left for abroad, people were probably patient and understanding, being aware that visiting a new country involves an adaptation process. The world does not always expect patience and understanding to be necessary and towards travelers who return home.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Elanul (cunoscut si sub numele de elk) nu este inerent agresiv, dar se va apăra dacă percepe o amenințare. Dacă oamenii nu consideră că elanii sunt potențial periculoși, s-ar putea apropia prea mult și s-ar pune în situații riscante.
mt: Elk (also known as moose) are not inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. If people do not consider elk to be potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves in risky situations.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Ziua, pe căldură, călătorii pot cădea pradă mirajelor care care produc iluzia apei (sau altor fenomene) la orizont. Acestea pot deveni periculoase când călătorul ia urma mirajelor, risipindu-și energia și apa rămasă. Chiar și cele mai fierbinți deșerturi pot deveni extrem de reci pe timp de noapte. Hipotermia reprezintă o amenințare reală în lipsa îmbrăcăminții călduroase.
mt: On a hot day, travelers can fall prey to mirages that produce the illusion of water (or other phenomena) on the horizon. These can be dangerous when the traveler follows the mirages, wasting their energy and remaining water. Even the hottest deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real threat in the lack of warm clothing.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: Ziua, pe căldură, călătorii pot cădea pradă mirajelor care care produc iluzia apei (sau altor fenomene) la orizont. Acestea pot deveni periculoase când călătorul ia urma mirajelor, risipindu-și energia și apa rămasă. Chiar și cele mai fierbinți deșerturi pot deveni extrem de reci pe timp de noapte. Hipotermia reprezintă o amenințare reală în lipsa îmbrăcăminții călduroase.
mt: On a hot day, travelers can fall prey to mirages that produce the illusion of water (or other phenomena) on the horizon. These can be dangerous when the traveler follows the mirages, wasting their energy and remaining water. Even the hottest deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real threat in the lack of warm clothing.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). src: Republica Dominicană (în spaniolă: República Dominicana) este o țară din Caraibe, care ocupă jumătatea de est a Insulei Hispaniola, pe care o împarte cu Haiti. Pe lângă plaje cu nisip alb și peisaje muntoase, țara găzduiește și cel mai vechi oraș european din Americi, acum făcând parte din Santo Domingo. Insula a fost pentru prima oară locuită de taino și de caribii. Caribii au fost o populație care vorbea limba arawakă, care sosise în jur de 10.000 î.e.n. La doar câțiva ani de la sosirea exploratorilor europeni, populația Tainos fusese semnificativ împuținată de către conchistadorii spanioli. Bazat pe Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratatul Indiilor), între 1492 și 1498 cuceritorii spanioli au ucis în jur de 100.000 de amerindieni Taino.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a country in the Caribbean, occupying the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. Besides white sand beaches and mountain scenery, the country also hosts the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taino and Carib peoples. The Caribs were a population that spoke the Arawakan language, who arrived around 10,000 BC. Just a few years after the arrival of European explorers, the Taino population had been significantly reduced by Spanish conquistadors. Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Treatise on the Indies), between 1492 and 1498 Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Amerindian Taino.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: Sporturile ce presupun coborârea pe zăpadă, care includ schiul și snowboardul, sunt sporturi populare, care constau din alunecarea în jos pe terenul acoperit de zăpadă, folosind schiuri sau o placă de snowboard atașată de picioare. „Schiatul este o activitate turistică majoră pentru mulți entuziaști, uneori numiți «ski bums» în engleză, care-și organizează vacanțe întregi în jurul schiatului într-un anumit loc.” Ideea schiatului este extrem de veche – avem picturi rupestre care reprezintă schiori încă de dinainte de anul 5000 î.e.n.! Schiul alpin ca sport datează cel puțin din secolul al XVII-lea, iar în 1861 norvegienii au deschis în Australia primul club de schi recreațional.
mt: Sports that involve sliding down snow-covered terrain, including skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports that consist of sliding down snow-covered terrain, using skis or a snowboard attached to the feet. “Skiing is a major tourist activity for many enthusiasts, sometimes called “ski bums” in English, who organize entire vacations around skiing in a particular place.” The idea of skiing is very old – we have rock paintings that depict skiers as early as before the year 5000 B.C.! Alpine skiing as a sport dates at least to the 17th century, and in 1861 Norwegians opened the first recreational ski club in Australia.
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: Insulele de est ale Africii se află în Oceanul Indian, în largul coastelor de est ale Africii. Madagascar este de departe cea mai mare și un adevărat continent de sine stătător când vine vorba de animale sălbatice. Cele mai multe dintre insulele mai mici sunt națiuni independente sau asociate cu Franța și sunt renumite ca stațiuni de plajă de lux. Arabii au introdus de asemenea și islamul în acele ținuturi, care a avut mare succes în Comoros și Mayotte. Influența și colonialismul european au început în secolul al XV-lea, când exploratorul portughez Vasco da Gama a descoperit calea maritimă din Europa spre India.
mt: The East African islands are in the Indian Ocean, off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the largest and a true continent of its own when it comes to wild animals. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations or associated with France and are renowned as luxury beach resorts. Arabs also introduced Islam in those lands, which has been very successful in Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, when Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama discovered the sea route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Există tradiția de a petrece noaptea de Paște treaz, în aer liber, pentru a vedea răsăritul soarelui. Pentru această tradiție există bineînțeles explicații în teologia creștină, dar ar putea foarte bine să fie un ritual pre-creștin al primăverii și fertilității. Bisericile mai tradiționaliste organizează adesea un priveghi de Paște sâmbătă seara în Săptămâna Mare, congregațiile reunindu-se adesea la miezul nopții pentru a sărbători învierea lui Hristos.
mt: There is a tradition of staying up all night on Easter Eve, outside, to see the sunrise.  Of course, there are explanations in Christian theology, but it could very well be a pre-Christian ritual of spring and fertility.  More traditional churches often organize a Good Friday vigil, congregations often gathering at midnight to celebrate the resurrection of Christ.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: Ecuadorul cere ca cetățenii Cubei să primească o scrisoare de invitație înainte de a intra în Ecuador folosind aeroporturile internaționale sau punctele de trecere a frontierei. Scrisoarea aceasta trebuie să fie legalizată de către Ministerul Afacerilor Externe al Ecuadorului și trebuie să respecte anumite cerințe. Cerințele acestea sunt concepute pentru a asigura o deplasare bine organizată între cele două țări. Cetățenii cubanezi care dețin cărți verzi pentru SUA trebuie să viziteze un consulat ecuadorian pentru a obține o scutire de la această cerință. Pașaportul dumneavoastră trebuie să fie valid pentru cel puțin 6 luni după data călătoriei. Un bilet dus-întors/continuare a călătoriei este necesar pentru a dovedi durata șederii.
mt: Ecuador is requesting that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter before entering Ecuador using international airports or border crossing points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and must meet certain requirements. These requirements are designed to ensure a well-organized travel between the two countries. Cuban citizens who hold green cards for the US must visit an Ecuadorian consulate to obtain an exemption from this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months after the date of travel. A round-trip/continuation ticket is required to prove the duration of stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Ochelarii pot costa mai puțin într-o altă țară, în special în țările cu venituri mici, unde costurile de manoperă sunt mai mici. Luați în considerare opțiunea de a face un examen ocular acasă, mai ales dacă e acoperit de asigurare, luând rețeta cu dvs. pentru a o depune în altă parte. Ramele disponibile în astfel de zone pot avea două probleme; unele pot fi imitații, iar cele reale și importate ar putea fi mai scumpe decât acasă.
mt: Glasses can be cheaper in another country, especially in low-income countries, where labor costs are lower. Consider the option of having an eye exam at home, especially if it is covered by insurance, taking your prescription with you to fill elsewhere. Frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be fakes, and the real and imported ones may be more expensive than at home.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Moneda oficială Falkland este lira Falkland (FKP), a cărei valoare este stabilită ca și echivalent a 1 liră sterlină (GBP). Puteți schimba bani la singura bancă din insule, situată în Stanley față în față cu magazinul FIC West. Lirele britanice vor fi acceptate, în general, peste tot pe insule, iar în Stanley, cardurile de credit și dolarii americani sunt de asemenea acceptați în mod frecvent. Pe insulele exterioare probabil că nu vor fi acceptate cărțile de credit, deși vor primi probabil valuta britanică și americană; luați din timp legătura cu proprietarii pentru a afla ce mijloace de plată acceptă. Este aproape imposibil să schimbați lirele din Falkland în afara țării, așa că trebuie să le schimbați înainte de a părăsi insulele.
mt: The official currency of the Falkland Islands is the Falkland pound (FKP), whose value is fixed as equivalent to 1 British pound (GBP). You can exchange money at the only bank on the islands, located in Stanley opposite the FIC West store. British pounds will be accepted everywhere on the islands, and in Stanley credit cards and American dollars are also accepted frequently. On the outer islands credit cards are unlikely to be accepted, but British and American currency will probably be accepted; check with owners beforehand to find out what forms of payment they accept. It is almost impossible to exchange Falkland pounds outside the country, so you must exchange them before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: Cele mai multe temple organizează un festival în perioada dintre sfârșitul lunii noiembrie și jumătatea lunii mai, data exactă variind în funcție de calendarul anual al fiecărui templu. Cele mai multe festivaluri ale templelor sunt celebrate cu ocazia aniversării templului, de ziua de naștere a zeității căruia îi este dedicat sau orice alte evenimente majore asociate cu templul. Festivalurile templului Kerala sunt foarte interesante de urmărit, cu o procesiune obișnuită de elefanți decorați, orchestra templului și alte festivități.
mt: Most temples organize a festival in the period between the end of November and the middle of May, the exact date varying according to the annual calendar of each temple. Most temple festivals are celebrated on the anniversary of the temple, the birthday of the deity to whom the temple is dedicated, or any other major events associated with the temple. Kerala temple festivals are very interesting to watch, with a usual procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Modul evident de a zbura la clasa întâi sau business este de a plăti un teanc mare de bani pentru acest privilegiu (sau, și mai bine, să-ți convingi compania să facă acest lucru pentru tine). Nu este însă ieftin: în general, vă puteți aștepta ca la clasa business să plătiți de până la patru ori tariful economic normal, iar la clasa întâi de până la unsprezece ori mai mult! În general, nici nu are rost să căutați reduceri pentru locurile la clasa business sau clasa I pentru zborurile directe de la A la B. Companiile aeriene știu foarte bine că există un anumit grup de pasageri care sunt dispuși să plătească mulți bani pentru privilegiul de a ajunge undeva rapid și confortabil, context în care acestea percep tarife conform cerințelor.
mt: 1. The obvious way to fly first or business class is to pay a large amount of money for this privilege (or, even better, to convince your company to do this for you). It's not cheap, though: in general, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business class, and up to eleven times the normal economy fare for first class! In general, it's not worth looking for discounts for business or first class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know very well that there is a certain group of passengers willing to pay a lot of money for the privilege of getting somewhere quickly and comfortably, in which case they charge according to demand.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Modul evident de a zbura la clasa întâi sau business este de a plăti un teanc mare de bani pentru acest privilegiu (sau, și mai bine, să-ți convingi compania să facă acest lucru pentru tine). Nu este însă ieftin: în general, vă puteți aștepta ca la clasa business să plătiți de până la patru ori tariful economic normal, iar la clasa întâi de până la unsprezece ori mai mult! În general, nici nu are rost să căutați reduceri pentru locurile la clasa business sau clasa I pentru zborurile directe de la A la B. Companiile aeriene știu foarte bine că există un anumit grup de pasageri care sunt dispuși să plătească mulți bani pentru privilegiul de a ajunge undeva rapid și confortabil, context în care acestea percep tarife conform cerințelor.
mt: 1. The obvious way to fly first or business class is to pay a large amount of money for this privilege (or, even better, to convince your company to do this for you). It's not cheap, though: in general, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business class, and up to eleven times the normal economy fare for first class! In general, it's not worth looking for discounts for business or first class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know very well that there is a certain group of passengers willing to pay a lot of money for the privilege of getting somewhere quickly and comfortably, in which case they charge according to demand.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Companii aeriene, precum Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways și Turkish Airlines, și-au extins semnificativ zborurile în Africa și oferă legături către multe orașe mari africane la prețuri convenabile, spre deosebire de alte companii aeriene europene. Începând cu 2014, Turkish Airlines face curse spre 39 de destinații din 30 de țări africane. Dacă ai timp de călătorie suplimentar, verifică prețul total al biletului către Africa comparativ cu prețul unui bilet în jurul lumii. Reamintiți-vă să adăugați costurile suplimentare pentru vizele adiționale taxele de plecare, transport în comun etc., pentru toate acele locuri aflate în afara Africii.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways and Turkish Airlines have significantly expanded their African routes and offer connections to many major African cities at reasonable prices, unlike other European airlines. Starting in 2014, Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries. If you have extra time, check the total price of the ticket to Africa compared to the price of a ticket around the world. Remember to add additional visa costs, departure taxes, public transport etc. for all those places outside Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Cumpărarea de mâncare de la supermarket este, de regulă, modul cel mai ieftin de a ne procura hrana. Dar, fără a avea posibilitatea de a găti, alegerile ne sunt limitate la mâncare gata preparată. Tot mai multe supermarketuri au raioane mai variate de mâncăruri gata preparate. Unele oferă chiar acces la cuptoare cu microunde sau alte modalități de a încălzi mâncarea. În unele țări sau tipuri de magazine, există cel puțin un restaurant arondat locului, deseori unul destul de informal, cu prețuri accesibile.
mt: Buying food at the supermarket is, usually, the cheapest way to get our food. But, without the ability to cook, our choices are limited to pre-prepared food. More and more supermarkets have a wider range of pre-prepared food. Some even offer access to microwave ovens or other ways to heat the food. In some countries or types of stores, there is at least one restaurant attached to the place, often a fairly informal one, with affordable prices.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Dialectele franceze vorbite în Belgia și Elveția sunt un pic diferite de franceza vorbită în Franța, deși sunt suficient de asemănătoare încât locuitorii să se înțeleagă reciproc. În special, sistemul de numărare în franceza vorbită în Belgia și Elveția are unele mici particularități care diferă de franceza vorbită în Franța, iar pronunția unor cuvinte este ușor diferită. Acestea fiind spuse, toți belgienii și elvețienii care vorbesc franceza au învățat franceza standard la școală, astfel încât vă vor înțelege chiar dacă folosiți sistemul francez obișnuit de numărare.
mt: The French dialects spoken in Belgium and Switzerland are a little different from the French spoken in France, although they are close enough that residents can understand each other. In particular, the system of numbering in the French spoken in Belgium and Switzerland has some minor peculiarities that differ from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. These being said, all Belgians and Swiss who speak French have learned standard French in school, so they will understand you even if you use the usual French system of numbering.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Doar câteva companii aeriene încă oferă prețuri în caz de deces, care fac o mică reducere a costului călătoriei de ultima oră pentru o înmormântare. Companiile aeriene care includ aceste servicii sunt Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa, pentru zboruri din SUA sau Canada, și WestJet. În toate situațiile, trebuie să faceți rezervarea prin apel telefonic direct la linia aeriană.
mt: Only a few airlines still offer prices in case of death, which make a small reduction in the cost of last-minute travel for a funeral. Airlines that include these services are Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa, for flights from the US or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must make the reservation by calling the airline directly.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

In all cases, you must make the reservation by calling the airline directly.

src: Folosirea aplicației de navigare GPS de pe telefon poate fi cel mai ușor și mai convenabil mod de a naviga când sunteți într-o țară străină. Poate economisi bani în loc să cumperi noi hărți pentru un GPS, sau un dispozitiv GPS independent sau să închiriezi unul de la o companie de închirieri de mașini. Dacă nu ai o conexiune de date pe telefon sau când te afli în afara rețelei, performanța lor poate fi limitată sau indisponibilă.
mt: Using the GPS navigation app on your phone is the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when you're in a foreign country. It can save money by not buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have data connection on your phone or when you're out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: Locurile și fauna sălbatică din Galapagos pot fi văzute cel mai bine dintr-o ambarcațiune, exact cum a făcut Charles Darwin în 1835. Peste 60 de nave de croazieră navighează în apele arhipelagului Galapagos, variind în capacitate între 8 și 100 de pasageri. Majoritatea oamenilor își fac rezervare cu mult timp înainte (dat fiind că ambarcațiunile, de obicei, sunt ocupate în plin sezon). Asigurați-vă că agentul prin care faceți rezervarea e specializat în Insulele Galapagos și cunoaște bine o gamă largă de nave. Aceasta va asigura asocierea intereselor și/sau limitărilor dvs. cu nava cea mai potrivită pentru ele.
mt: The best way to see the wildlife and scenery of the Galapagos is from a boat, just as Charles Darwin did in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships sail the waters of the Galapagos, ranging in capacity from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book well in advance (as the boats are usually full in high season). Make sure your agent is specialized in the Galapagos and knows a wide range of boats. This will ensure that your interests and/or limitations are matched with the most suitable boat for you.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Ca regulă generală, cazinourile depun toate eforturile pentru a maximiza timpul petrecut aici de clienți și banii cheltuiți de aceștia. De obicei, nu există ferestre și ceasuri, iar ieșirile pot fi găsite cu greu. De obicei, au oferte speciale de mâncare, băutură și divertisment, pentru a păstra buna dispoziție și oaspeții să rămână în local. Unele localuri oferă băuturi alcoolice din partea casei. Cu toate acestea, beția afectează judecata, iar jucătorii buni știu cât de important este să rămâi lucid.
mt: As a general rule, casinos make every effort to maximize the time spent here by customers and the money spent by them. Usually, there are no windows and clocks, and exits can be found with difficulty. Usually, there are special offers for food, drink and entertainment to keep the good mood and guests to stay in the local. Some establishments offer alcoholic beverages from the house. However, drunkenness affects judgment, and good players know how important it is to stay lucid.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Toate substantivele, precum și cuvântul Sie, care înseamnă tu, încep întotdeauna cu majusculă, chiar și în interiorul propoziției. Acesta este un mod important de a distinge între unele verbe și obiecte. De asemenea, fără îndoială, face cititul mai ușor, deși scrisul este cumva complicat de nevoia de a descoperi posibilitatea ca un verb sau un adjectiv să fie folosit într-o formă substantivizată.
mt: All nouns, as well as the word Sie, which means you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. Also, undoubtedly, makes reading easier, although writing is somehow complicated by the need to find the possibility that a verb or adjective may be used in a substantivized form.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: „În multe părți ale lumii, să faci cu mâna e un gest prietenos, folosit pentru a saluta.” „În Malaysia, însă, cel puțin printre locuitorii zonelor rurale, are semnificația de «vino-ncoace», asemănător cu gestul constând în îndoirea către corp a degetului arătător folosit în unele țări occidentale, și ar trebui folosit doar în acel scop.” Similar, un călător britanic în Spania poate greși un salut de la revedere care implică palma îndreptată spre cel care face cu mâna (mai degrabă decât persoana căreia i se face cu mâna) ca un gest de a reveni.
mt: “In many parts of the world, to wave with the hand is a friendly gesture, used to greet.” “In Malaysia, however, at least among rural inhabitants, it has the meaning of ‘come back’, similar to the gesture consisting of bending the index finger towards the body used in some Western countries, and should be used only in that purpose.” Similarly, a British traveler in Spain may misinterpret a farewell gesture involving the palm directed towards the person who waves (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture of returning.
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Ghețarii nu sunt stabili, ci alunecă pe versantul muntelui. Aceasta duce la apariția de fisuri și crevase care pot fi mascate de poduri de zăpadă. Pereții și acoperișurile peșterilor de gheață se pot prăbuși, iar crăpăturile se pot închide. La marginile ghețarilor, bucăți enorme se desprind, cad și pot să sară sau să se rostogolească la depărtare mai mare de margine.
mt: Glaciers are not stable, but slide down the mountain slope. This leads to the appearance of cracks and crevices that can be hidden by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse, and cracks can close. At the edges of glaciers, huge chunks break off, fall and can jump or roll away further from the edge.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
